name: Ninja Sky
description:
You will have 10 minutes to reach the northen plateform !

Ninja Sky VR is a game where you have to run and climb to get to the last platform. It's a virtual realitity parkour created for Oculus Quest.

We are in a calming environment but you will need to stay focused to complete the experience. The project was designed in 3rd person but you can switch the view in 1st person. you can play standing or sitting.

Suggestions are welcome - ©SensoryContent
